Option A (The phone nearly reaches the charging cable but stops inches away.) seems plausible if the man's attempts are not fully successful. Option B (The phone gets tangled with the charging cable and stops moving.) is less likely without visible interaction between the phone and cable. Option C (The phone slides under the charging cable instead.) would require a specific movement not indicated here. Option D (The phone only slides to the front of the charging cable.) is possible but less likely than A.
